name: Graphics Design (Editor)
tagline: Graphics Design while working as an Editor of the Student Association
body:
In junior year of the under graduation, I was the Editor of the Student Association of Information Technology. As an Editor I designed Event posters, certificates and mementos. Here are some of my creations-

## **1. Textrix Event Poster**
![Textrix](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rajeshsurana/EditorWork/master/TEXTTRIX2K10.jpg)



## **2. Hardware Workshop Poster**
![Hardware Workshop](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rajeshsurana/EditorWork/master/HardwareWorkshop.jpg)



## **3. Certificate**
![Certificate](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rajeshsurana/EditorWork/master/certificate.jpg)



## **4. Memento**
![Memento](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rajeshsurana/EditorWork/master/memento.jpg)
